items.text: The government announced new measures to improve public health.
items.translation_uz: Hukumat jamoat salomatligini yaxshilash uchun yangi choralar e'lon qildi.

items.text: Scientists have discovered a new species of butterfly in the rainforest.
items.translation_uz: Olimlar tropik o'rmonda kapalaklar yangi turini kashf qildilar.

items.text: The local football team won the championship for the third time.
items.translation_uz: Mahalliy futbol jamoasi chempionatni uchinchi marta qo'lga kiritdi.

items.text: Heavy rainfall caused severe flooding in several parts of the city.
items.translation_uz: Kuchli yomg'ir shaharning bir qancha joylarida kuchli toshqinlarga sabab bo'ldi.

items.text: The new hospital will open its doors to patients next month.
items.translation_uz: Yangi kasalxona kelasi oy bemorlar uchun eshiklarini ochadi.

items.text: Unemployment rates have dropped to the lowest level in ten years.
items.translation_uz: Ishsizlik darajasi o'n yil ichidagi eng past darajaga tushdi.

items.text: The mayor announced plans to build a new public library.
items.translation_uz: Hokim yangi ommaviy kutubxona qurish rejalarini e'lon qildi.

items.text: Electric car sales increased by fifty percent compared to last year.
items.translation_uz: Elektr avtomobil savdosi o'tgan yilga nisbatan ellik foizga oshdi.

items.text: The famous museum will host an exhibition of modern art.
items.translation_uz: Mashhur muzey zamonaviy san'at ko'rgazmasiga mezbonlik qiladi.

items.text: Rescue teams are searching for survivors after the earthquake.
items.translation_uz: Qutqaruv guruhlari zilziladan so'ng omon qolganlarni qidirmoqda.
